# a\(n\) \= n^n \- n\*\(n \+ 1\) / 2\.
https://oeis.org/A344919

## Mathematica
```Mathematica
Join[{1},Table[n^n-(n(n+1))/2,{n,20}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 07 2024 *)
```

## Python
```Python
def A344919(n):
    return (n**n)-(n*(n+1)//2) # _Karl-Heinz Hofmann_, Jun 19 2021
```
